reviews.text: I had a connection as Doncaster with a cycle reservation. The platform staff where very helpful and went out of their way to help my with my bike and get me to the right platform. This is nice as often I feel 2nd class as a cyclist travelling on public transport, but not here! Thank you

Train to Leeds changed platform 2 times, it started at platform 6, then to platform 0 and lastly platform 7 in a span of 5 minutes. Going one end of the station to the other which made me miss my connection. 

Please don't do that again, I felt really sorry for this guy who was practically running to get to platform 0 from 6 and then they changed it back to 7.

I know it's a very busy station but please try to be considerate when moving trains to different platforms.
Melanie in the ticket office was very helpful and worked out the best deal for me and my partner...thank you Melanie

Truly awful experience, loud mouthed female bully of a platform manager shouted out incorrect/conflicting instructions, insisted on sending the train on its way before speaking to me, then said "Oh it was not me, you should have got on that train", when I protested, said "you're threatening me and said that I would be prevented from travelling..." eventually got a station manager to provide me with alternative travel documentation!!!.

reviews.author_name: Tyrell’s Transport and Lift filming videos
reviews.text: The next train is to Doncaster on Platform 0. Please listen to this info. There is the Frenchgate Centre attached to it with Ecodisc lifts, but the lifts here are boring. Please mind the gap. Mind the gap.
